body: God this was emotional . I'm glad I read this. The sequel is titled Morning Rose and it is an absolute masterpiece of an ending for this.

@jaylin it's not the usual normal longing.He had been abused to the point that he believes he doesnt deserve anyones love.Even if someone do come close than the dirt would only transfer to them ...It is pretty much suicidal psychology.

this stuff is too real and it genuinely hurts...A little spark could have led him to move away from the darkness shrouded in his heart..
Hope the girl doesnt let off and search out for him.She got his address.
They are pretty perfect for each other
@pican3 sorry for misread and scolded for no reason , that's on me

@pican3 stfu , that's not sequel just another prequel of another's rui-sensei stuff so yeah fuck you and i've already see sequel with happy so next time try to be the hero you're better not talking shit

@PewPewPew bröther, the sauce, please

I hunger
There’s a second part? Shit bring that sauce
Lads and ladettes, there's a chapter 2 and it's ABSOLUTELY HALAL 👌👌👌

Even though I understand the content of this, I can't really understand the part of ending... I have the same feeling of desiring somone's love as the characters had in this doujinshi, but I dont experience something tragically like them. Advance that, I haven't done any action when I started typing my words. As a consequence, I consider that some readers perhaps have the same feeling as mine regarding one's nameless lonely in his/her heart.

Man , i've try so hard to keeps my feeling when i've read the english translation , is just so sad i can hold them bad , it's hurt like hell , came here to found fun and fapped but instead feels so yeah fuck you author
ah even I can't understand the text my brother boner-kun slowy sits
Damn I can't even nut in these doujin.
He shoulda said don’t fall in love with me in the very beginning man I’m hurt as shit
